Module jBomberman

Package view

package view
  • Class
    Description
    Animate
    This type of objects implements an operation to increase Decorator's footage
    Animations
    A set of Animate classes to increase all Decorator's game footage.
    Arches
    This class is composed by methods and pictures that concur to represent the external non-playable borders for game-panel.
    Arches.Arch
    Arches is formed by each Arch combination.
    ArchesCity
    The Arches with render specific format for City Stage context.
    ArchesClassical
    The Arches with render specific format for Classical Stage context.
    ArchesJungle
    The Arches with render specific format for Jungle Stage context.
    AvatarAccount
    Account Avatar.
    AvatarAccountSelectorButton
    A JButton with encapsulated AvatarAccount in it.
    AvatarAccountSelectorInCreationNested
    The nested panel into DynaSlaveAccountCreationNested in which all choosable AvatarAccount are showed.
    AvatarHeroItem
    This class represents a choosable player character in DynaSlavePlayer and DynaSlavePlayerNested panels.
    AvatarJListManagerOfSelections
    Personalized Listener of the DynaSlavePlayerNested JList Selection Model.
    AvatarJListModel
    Personalized model for the JList used in DynaSlavePlayerNested.
    AvatarJListRenderer
    Personalized CellRenderer for the JList used in DynaSlavePlayerNested.
    AvatarUser
    User's Avatar in game.
    ColorTwister
    This class encapsulates color manipulation algorithms.
    DecoratedAccount
    It's an Account (from Model) in which is wrapped an AvatarAccount (to represent it in the View) and a Color.
    DecoratedBomb
    Decorated Bomb for BombStandard and BombFast
    DecoratedBombRemote
    Decorated Bomb only for BombRemote
    DecoratedEnemyBoss
    Decorated version of an EnemyBoss
    DecoratedFire
    Decorated Prop version of a Fire from Model
    DecoratedGravediggerByNpc
    Decorated Gravedigger related to a death NPC event.
    DecoratedGravediggerScore
    Decorated Gravedigger related to a score acquisition by the player event.
    DecoratedLevel
    Decorated version of a Level in which view elements are wrapped.
    DecoratedMrPyroWhiteBlue
    Special DecoratedNonPlayableCharacter version for MrPyroWhiteBlue.
    DecoratedNonPlayableCharacter
    This class is a second level of abstraction to decorate an NPC component in a more specific way.
    DecoratedNonPlayableCharacterWithDeathImage
    This class is a third decoration step for Decorated Object in which death image is predefined
    DecoratedNpcDuo
    This class is a forth decoration step for a Decorated Object that is represented in two possible direction of movement during its animations.
    DecoratedNpcDuoRunner
    This class is a DecoratedNpcDuo class with Runner type.
    DecoratedNpcMono
    This class is a third decoration step for a Decorated Object that is represented in only one direction of movement during its animations.
    DecoratedNpcTetra
    This class is a third level of abstraction to decorate an NPC component in a more specific way.
    DecoratedObstacle
    DecoratorProp for an Obstacle type object
    DecoratedPlayerCharacter
    This class gives its supertype the footages array and lists and also the way to process these animations.
    DecoratedPowerUp
    Decorated version of a Prop object implementing Powerupper interface
    DecoratedTessera
    Decorated version of a Tessera object
    DecoratedWall
    Decorated version of a Wall object
    DecoratorAccount
    Decorator Pattern to decorate an Account from Model.
    DecoratorBomb
    Decorated version of a Bomb object
    DecoratorGravedigger
    Gravedigger Decoration permits to add special effects to a Gravedigger related event.
    DecoratorLevel
    Decorated version of a Level object
    DecoratorNonPlayableCharacter
    This class is a first decorative shell of an NPC component in the way of Decorator Design Pattern.
    DecoratorPlayerCharacter
    Decorated version of a PlayerCharacter to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way.
    DecoratorProp
    Decorated version of a Prop to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way.
    DecoratorTessera
    Decorated version of a TesseraAbstract to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way.
    DynaFrame
    This is the personalized JFrame of the application in which the View manifests.
    DynaJPanelAccountNested
    Personalized JPanel intended to be nested into a DynaSlaveCard JPanel
    DynaMasterCard
    This Class is the Game Model' Observer during running ThreadMenu and it is the Master of its CardLayout: the Layout that manages JPanels of the application.
    DynaSlaveAccount
    The Card shows current account data and can direct to account panels with advanced operations.
    DynaSlaveAccountCreation
    The Card implements GUI to create a new Account.
    DynaSlaveAccountCreationNested
    The nested JPanel receives input by User to create a new Decorated Account
    DynaSlaveAccountNested
    The nested JPanel to show current Account data.
    DynaSlaveAccountsManager
    The Card shows all accounts and proposes saving and loading file operations.
    DynaSlaveAccountsManagerNested
    The nested panel in which the table of all accounts is shown.
    DynaSlaveAccountsStats
    The Card shows accounts table filtered by User selected statistic operation.
    DynaSlaveAccountsStatsNested
    The nested panel in which filtered accounts table is shown.
    DynaSlaveCard
    This class defines the abstraction common to all card panels in the Master's CardLayout.
    DynaSlaveGame
    This Class is the Game Model' Observer during running ThreadGame.
    DynaSlaveOption
    The Card in which is possible to change game settings.
    DynaSlavePlayer
    The Card in which the User can select the Player Character for the game session.
    DynaSlavePlayerNested
    The nested panel that encapsulates a GridBagLayout to show choosable player Characters.
    DynaSlaveStage
    The Card in which User can choose the Stage to play.
    DynaSlaveStageNested
    This panel shows selected stage and permits to change it.
    DynaSlaveStart
    This Card is the first shown by this Application.
    DynaSound
    This class is used to play the video game's music (songs) and its sound effects.
    EnjoyNpcMediator
    Implemented version of NpcMediator from Model in which view components are developed.
    EnjoyPowerUpMediator
    Implemented version of PowerUpMediator from Model in which view components are developed.
    FileFilterJBomberMan
    Thi is the personalized FileFilter I use in the DynaSlaveAccountManager to accept, into the JFileChooser, only file with ".jbm" extension.
    FootageDeath
    FootageDeath type has methods to manage death animation.
    FootageFuncs
    FootageFuncs type has methods to manage its animation ( or footage ).
    FootageWin
    FootageWin type has methods to manage win animation.
    HeroesDescriptions
    Description container to use for selecting characters in the DynaSlavePlayerNested.
    MyJBombermanFormat
    Interface with public static field for these parameters: Game fluidity, Sprite standard dimensions, Game grid dimensions and derived values, PC's spawn coordinates.
    OptionExecuter
    An OptionExecuter is an executor of options Commands and esc function Command
    RelocateSpecialComponents
    A card with other components besides invisible buttons which must be relocated
    StatePanel
    Abstraction of View Game State used for DynaSlaveGame states.
    StatePanelContinue
    It's the state of the View when the player has lost an attempt but can decide to try another game session without game over.
    StatePanelGameOver
    It's the state of the view when a game over occurs.
    StatePanelGameWin
    It's the state of the view when a game level win occurs.
    StatePanelLoading
    It's the first state of the view when Controller and Model aren't ready yet.
    StatePanelOptionable
    Abstraction for states that display options on the screen that can be chosen by the user.
    StatePanelPaused
    It's the state of the view when the game is paused by the user.
    StatePanelPlaying
    It's the state of the view in which a game session is in progress.
    StatePanelStarter
    It's the state of the view that introduces the player to the level he is about to begin.
    StatePanelWinStage
    It's the state of the view in which the player won the stage.
    TableModelAccounts
    Personalized AbstractTableModel as model for JTable in the DynaSlaveAccountsManagerNested.
    TableRefresher
    View component that has a JTable and need to recalculate it because view updates.
    Vocabulary
    This class is used to convert String objects into images to be drawn in the view in order to obtain a coherent aesthetic in the video game
